text:
- Made ```fit()``` usable from BaseDecomposition module for all decomposition estimators.
- This ```fit()``` can also be adapted to Parcellations object which is almost in ready in PR #1370 
- Added documentation for missing attributes in ```CanICA``` and ```DictLearning```.
- Added documentation for ```Returns``` in ```BaseDecomposition``` ```fit()```.

Can I have your opinions on this ?
